text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 106233006 (Topographical modifier)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 272424004 (Relative sites)

name: LocationQualifierVS
title: Location Qualifier Value Set
description: Qualifiers to refine the anatomical location. These include qualifiers for laterality, relative location, directionality, number, and plane.
